title: Ebert & Roeper - 06.29.08 - guest host Michael Phillips
description:
Ebert & Roeper  -  June 29th, 2008 - with guest host [url=http://www.chicagotribune.com/features/chi-michaelphillipscritic,1,931773.storygallery?coll=chi-entertainment-utl]Michael Phillips[/url], film critic for the Chicago Tribune

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0373051/]Journey to the Center of the Earth[/url]

	--- Next Week
		The Best Movies of the Year ... So Far

-------------------------------------------------
SPOILERS - The following list gives the thumbs up or thumbs down vote which the movies received.  (Phillips - Roeper)
-------------------------------------------------

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0493464/]Wanted[/url]  -  down - up
-- Angelina Jolie - James McAvoy - Morgan Freeman

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0889134/]Finding Amanda[/url]  -  down - down
-- Matthew Broderick - Brittany Snow - Maura Tierney

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0373051/]Journey to the Center of the Earth[/url]  -  up - up
-- Brendan Fraser - Josh Hutcherson - Anita Briem

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0910970/]WALLÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â·E[/url]  -  (way) up - (way) up
-- animated film from PIXAR

[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1093824/]Encounters at the End of the World[/url]  -  (big thumbs) up - (big thumbs) up
-- Werner Herzog documentary
